content: the next space x8 slip_stitch to the 1st cluster 32 cls r 13 chain 2 5dc-cluster in each of the next 15 space chain 2 skip 1 space x2 slip_stitch to the 1st cluster 30 cls 2 ch2 space r 14 chain 2 5dc-cluster in each of the next 14 space 2-5dc-cluster into the ch2 space x2 slip_stitch to the 1st cluster 32 cls r 15 chain 2 5dc-cluster in every space x32 slip_stitch to the 1st cluster 32 cls r 16 repeat r 15 slip_stitch 1 or 2 st and fasten_off 4 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws this pattern chart starts at r 6 of the written pattern - the inner round of red single_crochet s this chart is meant to be used along with the written pattern starting from the center and going out 5 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws strap 4 5mm hook dark brown yarn chain 9 turn starting in the 2nd chain from the hook and into the back bumps of the chain for r 1 r 1 r 3 half_double_crochet 8 chain 1 turn 8 3 row r 4 half_double_crochet 8 don t chain 1 8 r 5 fold the piece to start crocheting in the round photos left  single_crochet to the first half_double_crochet of row 4 and crochet clockwise half_double_crochet 6 decrease 7 r 6 half_double_crochet 7 in the round until the strap is the desired length 7 connect each round with half_double_crochet and crochet in continuous rounds the strap pictured is 40 inches long end of strap photos right → chain 1 turn starting in the first st r 1 half_double_crochet 6 2 half_double_crochet in the last st chain 1 turn 8 r 2 r 3 half_double_crochet 8 chain 1 turn 8 2 row r 4 half_double_crochet 8 8 fasten_off 6 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws acorn bag 4 5mm hook beige yarn connect each round with single_crochet and crochet in continuous rounds r 1 ml single_crochet 6 into the ml 6 r 35 we will stitch the strap to the bag this round by placing the strap on r 2 single_crochet 1 st increase x3 9 the outside of the bag underside
